  <description>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_102392</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_102392</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Effect of having an iron core to the electromagnet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Effekt des Habens eines Eisenkernes zum 
Elektromagneten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Effet d'avoir un noyau de fer à 
l'électro-aimant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Efeito de ter um núcleo de ferro ao eletroímã</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Effetto di avere un nucleo di ferro 
all'elettromagnete</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επίδραση της κατοχής ενός πυρήνα σιδήρου στον 
ηλεκτρομαγνήτη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Efecto del tener una base de hierro al 
electroimán</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that the magnetic field of the iron core adds to the magnetic field of the coils which enhances the strength of the magnet.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">coils</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electric current</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electromagnets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">iron core</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetism</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß die magnetischen vom 
Eisenkern hinzufügt dem magnetischen auffangen von den 
Spulen auffangen, welches die Stärke des Magneten erhöht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que le champ 
magnétique du noyau de fer ajoute au champ magnétique des 
enroulements ce qui met en valeur la force de l'aimant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que o campo magnético 
do núcleo de ferro adiciona ao campo magnético das bobinas qual 
realça a força do ímã.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che il campo 
magnetico del nucleo di ferro aggiunge al campo magnetico delle bobine
quale aumenta la resistenza del magnete.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι το μαγνητικό πεδίο του
πυρήνα σιδήρου προσθέτει στο μαγνητικό πεδίο των πηνίων που 
ενισχύει τη δύναμη του μαγνήτη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que el campo magnético
de la base de hierro agrega al campo magnético de las bobinas cuál 
realza la fuerza del imán.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spulen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrischer Strom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektromagneten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eisenkern</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
